actions.thanksMessage: Thanks for exploring my portfolio! Feel free to restart or reach out anytime.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Experienced UI/UX Designer and Front-End Developer Crafting High-Impact Digital Experiences

experience.title: 12+ Years Experience
experience.description: Working across Healthcare, Military domains, Banking, Education, Social Apps, and e-commerce sectors with diverse teams and technologies.

mission.title: My Mission
mission.description: To bridge the gap between design and development, creating intuitive interfaces that users love.

passion.title: What I Love
passion.description: Exploring new technologies, solving complex problems, and bringing creative ideas to life through code.

about.longDescription1: With over 12 years of experience in web design and front-end development, I have contributed to projects ranging from small business websites to large-scale enterprise applications. My approach blends technical precision with creative problem-solving, ensuring that every solution is visually compelling, high-performing, and driven by user needs.
about.longDescription2: I specialize in UI/UX design with deep expertise in UX strategy, user research, journey mapping, wireframing, prototyping, usability testing, and design system development. I work extensively with Figma, Sketch, and the Adobe Creative Suite, leveraging AI-driven design and productivity tools to accelerate delivery and enhance creativity.

experience.title: Changelog from My Journey
experience.subtitle: A timeline of my professional growth and key milestones

timeline.title: UX/UI Designer
timeline.description: Driving end-to-end design and development of innovative digital products, emphasizing user-centered experiences and modern web technologies.
achievements: Working on a military client location, contributing to delivering secure, enterprise-grade digital solutions.
Contributed to military domain platforms, handling CR enhancements and feature upgrades for mission-critical systems.
Developed and maintained Angular + .NET and Angular + Java applications, managing UI/UX design and front-end implementation end-to-end.
Collaborated closely with Business Analysts (BA) and MDE stakeholders, translating requirements into intuitive UI/UX solutions aligned with stakeholder expectations.
Built 10+ production-ready web applications using React and Next.js.
Established a scalable design system and reusable component library, adopted across multiple projects to ensure consistency and faster delivery.

timeline.title: Team Lead UI/UX & Senior Frontend Developer
timeline.description: Designed and developed critical government portals including healthcare regulatory systems, military solutions, and attendance management platforms.
achievements: Delivered healthcare regulatory portal serving 500+ facilities
Implemented biometric attendance system for 10,000+ government employees
Achieved 98% user satisfaction rating on military digital solutions
Digitized manual workflow processes reducing administrative overhead by 60%
Orchestrated secure data exchange protocols complying with national health data standards
Mentored junior developers in UI/UX best practices and modern frontend architectures

timeline.title: Product Designer, UI/UX Developer
timeline.description: Designed and developed a scalable social media platform, bridging the gap between product vision and technical implementation.
achievements: Built Social media app with 50,000+ active users
Led product design lifecycle from user research and wireframing to high-fidelity UI
Reduced page load time by 60% through front-end performance optimization
Implemented secure authentication and real-time social features
Collaborated with backend teams to optimize data fetching strategies for rich media content
Established a unified design system reducing UI development time by 40%

timeline.title: Sr. UI/UX Designer, UI Developer
timeline.description: Led the UI/UX design and frontend development for a comprehensive construction management platform, streamlining complex architectural workflows.
achievements: Designed and developed a centralized construction management dashboard for monitoring multiple international projects
Created intuitive interfaces for handling large-scale architectural blueprints and document management systems
Implemented real-time project tracking features enabling stakeholders to monitor progress and resource allocation
Standardized the UI component library across the platform, improving development efficiency by 35%
Conducted user research with architects and project managers to optimize critical workflows and reduce error rates
Integrated complex data visualization tools for financial reporting and timeline estimation

timeline.title: UI/UX Designer, UI Developer
timeline.description: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver dynamic web solutions, enhancing user engagement and brand visibility for SMB clients.
achievements: Developed fully responsive websites for 15+ clients using Bootstrap and custom CSS frameworks
Revamped legacy UIs to modern, mobile-first standards, increasing mobile traffic participation by 50%
Worked closely with backend developers to integrate PHP-based CMS solutions
Designed and implemented interactive UI elements using jQuery and vanilla JavaScript
Maintained 100% on-time delivery record for client projects

timeline.title: UI Designer, UI Developer
timeline.description: Kickstarted professional career by transforming static designs into functional, standards-compliant web interfaces.
achievements: Translated PSD designs into pixel-perfect, W3C compliant HTML/CSS templates
Optimized frontend assets for faster load times across various browsers (including IE compatibility)
Assisted senior developers in debugging and maintaining large-scale web applications
Gained deep understanding of the software development lifecycle and version control
Contributed to the company's internal library of reusable UI widgets

skills.title: My Skills & Expertise
skills.subtitle: A blend of creativity, design, and development ‚Äî focused on crafting exceptional digital experiences.

descriptions.design: Visual storytelling with systems, prototypes, and polished UI.
descriptions.creative: Exploring motion and creative tools to craft delightful experiences.
descriptions.frontend: Building performant, accessible interfaces with modern frameworks.
descriptions.backend: APIs, tooling, and workflows that power products behind the scenes.
descriptions.ai: Prompting and AI tools to accelerate design and development.
descriptions.devops: Collaboration, versioning, and delivery pipelines to ship reliably.

recruiter.question: What is your expertise?
recruiter.answer: I specialize in UI/UX Design and Front-end Development with hands-on experience in Next.js, Vite, Angular, React, Vue.js, Shadcn UI, TailwindCSS, and Bootstrap. Skilled in HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, Figma, Sketch, Adobe Suite, AI Prompting, and version control tools like Git and SVN.

recruiter.question: What industries have you worked in?
recruiter.answer: I've designed and developed solutions for Healthcare, Banking, Social Apps, HR Solutions, Government & Military domains, Booking systems, Service portals, E-commerce, and Creative Branding projects.

recruiter.question: Do you have experience with collaborative projects?
recruiter.answer: Yes. I've worked in design agencies, startups, and government regulators, collaborating closely with developers, analysts, product owners, and stakeholders.

recruiter.question: What are your core skills?
recruiter.answer: My key strengths include UI/UX Design, Branding, Front-end Development, Interactive Prototyping, Responsive Layouts, Component Libraries, and CMS Websites.

recruiter.question: Can you share some main projects?
recruiter.answer: A few highlights: HR Management Dashboard (Next.js + Shadcn), Booking & Appointment System, Government Health Regulatory Portal, Government Attendance System with Live Actions, Police & Military Digital Solutions, E-commerce & Business Websites, Interactive Landing Pages & Personal Portfolio.

recruiter.question: How can I contact you?
recruiter.answer: You can reach me via my Portfolio Website, LinkedIn, Email, or WhatsApp. I'm also happy to share my CV upon request.

client.question: What services do you provide?
client.answer: I help businesses with UI/UX design, prototyping, branding, and front-end development to turn concepts into functional, user-friendly products.

client.question: Can you customize dashboards or booking systems?
client.answer: Absolutely. I create custom dashboards, booking platforms, attendance portals, and workflow tools tailored to your business needs.

client.question: Do you also work with branding and identity?
client.answer: Yes. I provide branding, logo design, and UI style guides, ensuring your product identity aligns with your audience.

client.question: What's your design and development process?
client.answer: My workflow: Requirements & Research ‚Üí Wireframes ‚Üí Figma Prototypes / Branding Concepts ‚Üí Front-end Build (Next.js / Shadcn / TailwindCSS).

client.question: Do you work on XR/AR/VR projects?
client.answer: Yes! I have explored XR (AR/VR/MR) and plan to feature more immersive experiences in my portfolio.

client.question: How can we start working together?
client.answer: Reach me via Portfolio Website, LinkedIn, or WhatsApp. I'm open to freelance, contract, or project-based work.

collaborator.question: What's your tech stack?
collaborator.answer: I mainly use Next.js, React, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, Shadcn UI, Framer Motion, and design tools like Figma & Adobe Suite.

collaborator.question: Do you work on open-source or side projects?
collaborator.answer: Yes! I enjoy building tools, UI kits, dashboards, and experimental portfolio projects.

collaborator.question: Are you involved in any startups?
collaborator.answer: Yes, I'm part of Mouzee.Tech, a startup team focused on digital products, UI/UX design, and branding.

collaborator.question: What skills do you bring to a team?
collaborator.answer: I bridge the design-to-code gap, offering UI/UX prototyping, front-end coding, and creative branding.

collaborator.question: Do you collaborate remotely?
collaborator.answer: Yes, I'm flexible with remote collaboration, async workflows, and modern team tools.

collaborator.question: Where can I connect with you?
collaborator.answer: Let's connect via Portfolio Website, GitHub, or LinkedIn. I'm always open to interesting collaborations!
